name: SLASHER:helloween
description:
SLASHER:helloween is a Roguelike, Atari inspired Top-Down Shoot-Em-Up with an 80's Slasher/Halloween theme. Earn score by killing Camp Counselors in over 20 levels, Use score to upgrade The Slasher, and find secrets to unlock secret Levels!

SLASHER:helloween is an Indie game developed under one person, and will be released under Early Access October 2021.
